40 ||| [COLOR red]---------------------------------- Thanks for choosing [B]MK-IV[/B]! ----------------------------------[/COLOR]
Latest Update was uploaded October 15th, 2016.
***On first start you will be prompted to disable 'Aeon Nox: Silvo' --- You MUST select NO to use the build.***
-Fixed 'Her Place' section -Fixed multiple error notifications -Added some new backgrounds -Other minor tweaks
Enjoy! :)
